item.title: Yet another High Alcher :D {now with srl}
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

holdmouse and click mouse and movemoussmooth are all very tectable
try converting to srl and usng
Mouse(x,y,rx,ry,tue)
it moves mouse and clicks all in one =)
Also in ur setup section
[scar]move
value:=768; // money earned per alc. [Yew long = 768] [Magic long = 1536]
spent:=700; // money spent on each item. ie: nats+bs+log = 310+160+230 = 700
[/scar]
to consts.

like this
[scar]
Porgram Alcher;
Const
value:=768; // money earned per alc. [Yew long = 768] [Magic long = 1536]
spent:=700; // money spent on each item. ie: nats+bs+log = 310+160+230 = 700

Procedure setup;[/scar]

Alll userstup should be consts.
It will be fastier for ppl to find and stuff.
But seems like a prety nice first script good job

item.title: Yet another High Alcher :D {now with srl}
item.dc:creator: @cygo cygo
item.description:
@cygo wrote:

Ok, i edited it to use srl, and it also now checks magic exp every once in a while
[scar]//Jamie’s High Alcer
//
//
//
//
// You have 15 seconds after starting the script to position your mouse.
// I put my item in 11th place, then have magic scrollbar about halfway down.
//
// Start in magic menu!! With mouse over the left side of High Alchemy.
//
// The alcer will alc from 100 to 185 items.
// Input vars in lines 42-43;
// PR will show exp gained, money earned, profit, and other junk.
// No antirandoms, probably pretty detectable.
//
//
//
// Future updates:
// Forms
// Better randomizing for less chance of getting caught
// ^^ I added srl, and checks magic exp every 15-50 alcs.

program JamiesAlcer;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
Var
x1,y1,x2,y2:integer; //mouse coords
total,alcloop:integer; //loop counters
moo,moov:integer; //random mouse movement counters
money, exp, value, profit, spent :integer; // progress report info’s

procedure AllignMouse;
begin
Wait(10000);
Wait(15000); //allows 15 seconds to setup mouse in correct location
//if(GetCurrentTab <> 7) then GameTab(7);
//Wait(10000);
End;

procedure intro;
begin
Writeln (’====================================’);
Writeln (’=Thanks for using Jamies High Alcer=’);
end;

procedure setup;
begin
value:=768; // money earned per alc. [Yew long = 768] [Magic long = 1536]
spent:=700; // money spent on each item. ie: nats+bs+log = 310+160+230 = 700
GetMousePos(x1,y1); //puts current mouse position into vars
x2:=x1;
y2:=y1;
total:=Random(85)+100; //determines how many bows to alc
alcloop:=0; //sets counter to 0
moov:=random(5)+5; //deterines how many to alc before relocating mouse
exp:=total65; //how much magic exp you gain
money:=totalvalue; //how much money from alcing
profit:=total*(value-spent); //how much profit you have
Writeln (’=Current X ’ + inttostr(x1) + ’ Current Y ’ + inttostr(y1) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’====================================’);
Writeln (’=Alcs to do: ’ + inttostr(total) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’=Exp Gain: ’ + Inttostr(exp) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’=Money Gain: ’ + Inttostr(money) + ’ Profit: ’ + inttostr(profit) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’=Move mouse after: ’ + inttostr(moov) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’====================================’);
end;

procedure alc;
begin
repeat;
alcloop:=alcloop+1;
mouse(x1,y1,2,2,true);
wait(random(300)+300);
mouse(x1,y1,0,1,true);
wait(random(400)+3300);
moo:=moo+1;
if moo = moov then
begin
moo:=0;
moov:=(random(35)+15);
Wait(random(2500)+500);
Gametab(2);
Wait(4500+random(600));
MMouse(585,377,20,8);
wait(3000+Random(1500));
Gametab(7);
Wait(1700+random(1000));
mmouse(x2,y2,2,2);
Wait(500+random(300));
end;

until(alcloop=total);
end;

begin
setupsrl;
allignmouse;
intro;
setup;
alc;
end.
[/scar]

=============================================================================

Yep, my first rs2 script, a high alcher.
there seems to be a problem with the mouse movement, it moves, and then moves back. this might just be me though, im half blind :rolleyes: so… any comments, suggestions? ;D

dont use on any chars that you don’t want banned probably quite detectable.
[scar]
//Jamie’s High Alcer
//
//
//
//
// You have 15 seconds after starting the script to position your mouse.
// I put my item in 11th place, then have magic scrollbar about halfway down.
//
// Start in magic menu!! With mouse over the left side of High Alchemy.
//
// The alcer will alc from 100 to 185 items.
// Input vars in lines 42-43;
// PR will show exp gained, money earned, profit, and other junk.
// No antirandoms, probably pretty detectable.
//
//
//
// Future updates:
// Forms
// Better randomizing for less chance of getting caught

program JamiesAlcer;
Var
x1,y1:integer; //mouse coords
alcs,total,alcloop:integer; //loop counters
moo,moov:integer; //random mouse movement counters
money, exp, value, profit, spent :integer; // progress report info’s

procedure AllignMouse;
begin
Wait(15000); //allows 15 seconds to setup mouse in correct location
End;

procedure intro;
begin
Writeln (’====================================’);
Writeln (’=Thanks for using Jamies High Alcer=’);
end;

procedure setup;
begin
value:=768; // money earned per alc. [Yew long = 768] [Magic long = 1536]
spent:=700; // money spent on each item. ie: nats+bs+log = 310+160+230 = 700
GetMousePos(x1,y1); //puts current mouse position into vars
total:=Random(85)+100; //determines how many bows to alc
alcloop:=0; //sets counter to 0
moov:=random(25)+25; //deterines how many to alc before relocating mouse
exp:=total65; //how much magic exp you gain
money:=totalvalue; //how much money from alcing
profit:=total*(value-spent); //how much profit you have
Writeln (’=Current X ’ + inttostr(x1) + ’ Current Y ’ + inttostr(y1) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’====================================’);
Writeln (’=Alcs to do: ’ + inttostr(total) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’=Exp Gain: ’ + Inttostr(exp) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’=Money Gain: ’ + Inttostr(money) + ’ Profit: ’ + inttostr(profit) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’=Move mouse after: ’ + inttostr(moov) + ’ =’);
Writeln (’====================================’);
end;

procedure alc;
begin
repeat;
alcloop:=alcloop+1;
HoldMouse(x1,y1,true);
Wait(Random(100)+50);
ReleaseMouse(x1,y1,true);
wait(random(300)+300);
holdmouse(x1,y1,true); // Alc’s =]
wait(random(300)+300);
releasemouse(x1,y1,true);
wait(Random(600)+2400);
moo:=moo+1;
if moo = moov then
begin
moo:=0;
y1:=y1+random(3)-2;
movemousesmooth(x1,y1); // humanlike mousemovement of 3 pixels.
wait(50);
end;
alcs:=alcs+1;
until(alcloop=total);
end;

begin
allignmouse;
intro;
setup;
alc;
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
